ratings.question_text: Overall, how would you rate the workload of this course in comparison to other Yale courses you have taken:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
What is your overall rating of the primary instructor?
The primary instructor's sensitivity to students and ability to provide students with adequate feedback was:

narratives.question_text: Indicate the total number of hours per week (outside the classroom) you spent on this course:
Looking back on this course, what is your overall assessment of the course:  What are its strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might it be improved?
comments: Good informative class for biostatistics student. But sometimes the topic requires certain knowledge of that specific area.
The course can broaden our vision on current researches.
Good for students who want to do research

narratives.question_text: Please evaluate the instructor of this course. What are the instructor's strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might his or her teaching be improved?
comments: Instructor: Joshua L. Warren  each seminar is very well organized
Instructor: Joshua L. Warren  Responsible instructor!
Instructor: Michael John Kane  each seminar is very well organized
Instructor: Michael John Kane  Very good, prepare for each guest in the seminar

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize this course for a fellow student? Would you recommend it to another student? Why or why not?
comments: This is an enlightening course. I definitely will recommend it to other students.
Would recommend for students who have interests in research
